name: Abandon the ship!
description:
Diddi is trapped on a ship that's doomed to destruction. You will have to guide him to the last escape pod!

You can download one of the following versions of the game. Also, you may want to try the web version! Try it out using this link!

You'll also find useful information at the GitHub repo of this game. I would recommend you to read a guide I wrote to help you.
